org.intermine.api.template
Class ApiTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.intermine.pathquery.PathQuery
      org.intermine.template.TemplateQuery
          org.intermine.api.template.ApiTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, org.intermine.api.profile.Taggable, org.intermine.api.search.WebSearchable
public class ApiTemplate
extends org.intermine.template.TemplateQuery
implements org.intermine.api.search.WebSearchable

This class extends TemplateQuery to provide the features needed by the API - Lucene indexing and database serialisation.
